name: Rotini Pasta Bake
author: Samantha Czajka
summary: My mother combined these ingredients to make a wonderful and convenient meal.  To complete the meal serve with breadsticks and steamed asparagus.
directions: In a large pot cook rotini pasta in boiling salted water until al dente
Cook ground turkey or beef in medium skillet until brown
Add the diced onion, salt and pepper
Mix in half of the jar of spaghetti sauce
In a large bowl add the browned beef mixture to the drained pasta and stir in the second half of the  of spaghetti sauce
Pour mixture into a 2 quart baking dish
In a preheated 425 degree F (230 degree C) oven bake for 20 minutes
Remove foil, sprinkle shredded mozzarella cheese and return to oven for 5 to 10 minutes
